s2.title: Before you report a bug
s2.p: Before you report a bug, please, read the following instructions:

ul.li: If doubt exists whether the behavior in question is a bug or a feature, please post a message to the xerces-j-user list for clarification.

To help to eliminate duplicate or invalid bug reports, such as external-schemaLocation bug, please take a quick look at bugs in Bugzilla opened against the version you're working with to see whether the bug has been already reported and/or fixed. You can also download the latest code in CVS and check if you can reproduce the bug.
Report bugs against the newest release.

s2.p: We strongly encourage you write patches for problems you find and submit them to xerces-j-dev@xml.apache.org. In the interest of fixing bugs, adding enhancements, and addressing outstanding design issues, we need your active participation in the ongoing development of Xerces2.

s2.title: Report a bug
s2.p: Have you read the instructions above? If yes, please click here to submit a bug report.
